      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.commons.math3.genetics.Chromosome mutate(org.apache.commons.math3.genetics.Chromosome c)
      Mutate the given original Chromosome by randomly deciding how many genes to change and setting them to values randomly drawn from a range of valid values or return an error if the given Chromosome is not an instance of NeuralNetworkChromosome.

      Select a randomly chosen AbstractRealDistribution.
